title:
Investigation of the Pressure Dependent Physical Properties of MAX Phase
  Ti2AlX (X = B, C, and N) Compounds: A First-Principles Study
authors:
M.I. Naher, M. Montasir, M.Y.H. Khan, M.A. Ali, M.M. Hossain, M.M.
  Uddin, M.Z. Hasan, M.A. Hadi, S.H. Naqib
abstract:
The physical properties and their pressure dependence of recently synthesized
Ti2AlX (X = B, C, and N) MAX phases are investigated for the very first time
applying density functional theory (DFT).
